card.name: Ancient Animus
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control if it's legendary. Then it fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Befuddle
card.text: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Broken Bond
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Baloth Gorger
card.text: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional 4 as you cast this spell.) If Baloth Gorger was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Blink of an Eye
card.text: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

card.name: Blackblade Reforged
Bloodstone Goblin
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, if that spell was kicked, Bloodstone Goblin gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Charge
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Corrosive Ooze
card.text: Whenever Corrosive Ooze blocks or becomes blocked by an equipped creature, destroy all Equipment attached to that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Curator's Ward
card.text: Enchant permanent Enchanted permanent has hexproof. When enchanted permanent leaves the battlefield, if it was historic, draw two cards. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Dub
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and is a Knight in addition to its other types.

card.name: Dark Bargain
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Dark Bargain deals 2 damage to you.

card.name: Deep Freeze
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 0/4, has defender, loses all other abilities, and is a blue Wall in addition to its other colors and types.

card.name: Demonic Vigor
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Evra, Halcyon Witness
card.text: Lifelink {4}: Exchange your life total with Evra, Halcyon Witness's power.

card.name: Fungal Infection
card.text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Verdant Force
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Fight with Fire
card.text: Kicker {5}{R} (You may pay an additional {5}{R} as you cast this spell.) Fight with Fire deals 5 damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked, it deals 10 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets instead. (Those targets can include players and planeswalkers.)

card.name: Gift of Growth
card.text: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Gaea's Protector
card.text: Gaea's Protector must be blocked if able.

card.name: Gaea's Blessing
card.text: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library. Draw a card. When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Healing Grace
card.text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn by a source of your choice. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Jhoira's Familiar
card.text: Flying Historic spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Kwende, Pride of Femeref
card.text: Double strike Creatures you control with first strike have double strike.

card.name: Keldon Warcaller
card.text: Whenever Keldon Warcaller attacks, put a lore counter on target Saga you control.

card.name: Llanowar Scout
card.text: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Multani, Yavimaya's Avatar
card.text: Reach, trample Multani, Yavimaya's Avatar gets +1/+1 for each land you control and each land card in your graveyard. {1}{G}, Return two lands you control to their owner's hand: Return Multani from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Navigator's Compass
card.text: When Navigator's Compass enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. {T}: Until end of turn, target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice in addition to its other types.

card.name: On Serra's Wings
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature is legendary, gets +1/+1, and has flying, vigilance, and lifelink.

card.name: Rampaging Cyclops
card.text: Rampaging Cyclops gets -2/-0 as long as two or more creatures are blocking it.

card.name: Radiating Lightning
card.text: Radiating Lightning deals 3 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

card.name: Shield of the Realm
card.text: If a source would deal damage to equipped creature, prevent 2 of that damage. Equip {1}

card.name: Sparring Construct
card.text: When Sparring Construct dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Sporecrown Thallid
card.text: Each other creature you control that's a Fungus or Saproling gets +1/+1.

card.name: Settle the Score
card.text: Exile target creature. Put two loyalty counters on a planeswalker you control.

card.name: Torgaar, Famine Incarnate
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature sacrificed this way. When Torgaar, Famine Incarnate enters the battlefield, up to one target player's life total becomes half their starting life total, rounded down.

card.name: Urza's Tome
card.text: {3}, {T}: Draw a card. Then discard a card unless you exile a historic card from your graveyard. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Thallid Soothsayer
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

card.name: Voltaic Servant
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, untap target artifact.

card.name: Sorcerer's Wand
card.text: Equipped creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. If this creature is a Wizard, it deals 2 damage to that player or planeswalker instead." Equip {3}

card.name: Whisper, Blood Liturgist
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice two creatures: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Skizzik
card.text: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Skizzik unless it was kicked.

card.name: Karn, Scion of Urza
card.text: +1: Reveal the top two cards of your library. An opponent chooses one of them. Put that card into your hand and exile the other with a silver counter on it. −1: Put a card you own with a silver counter on it from exile into your hand. −2: Create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control."

card.name: Baird, Steward of Argive
card.text: Vigilance Creatures can't attack you or a planeswalker you control unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures.

card.name: Benalish Honor Guard
card.text: Benalish Honor Guard gets +1/+0 for each legendary creature you control.

card.name: Benalish Marshal
card.text: Other creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Blessed Light
card.text: Exile target creature or enchantment.

card.name: Board the Weatherlight
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a historic card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Danitha Capashen, Paragon
card.text: First strike, vigilance, lifelink Aura and Equipment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Daring Archaeologist
card.text: When Daring Archaeologist enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. Whenever you cast a historic spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Daring Archaeologist. (Artifacts, legendaries and Sagas are historic).

card.name: Dauntless Bodyguard
card.text: As Dauntless Bodyguard enters the battlefield, choose another creature you control. Sacrifice Dauntless Bodyguard: The chosen creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Fall of the Thran
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Destroy all lands. II, III — Each player returns two land cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: History of Benalia
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. III — Knights you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Invoke the Divine
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

card.name: Knight of Grace
card.text: First strike Hexproof from black (This creature can't be the target of black spells or abilities your opponents control.) Knight of Grace gets +1/+0 as long as any player controls a black permanent.

card.name: Lyra Dawnbringer
card.text: Flying, first strike, lifelink Other Angels you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink.

card.name: Mesa Unicorn
card.text: Lifelink

card.name: Seal Away
card.text: Flash When Seal Away enters the battlefield, exile target tapped creature an opponent controls until Seal Away leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Serra Angel
card.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

card.name: Serra Disciple
card.text: Flying, first strike Whenever you cast a historic spell, Serra Disciple gets +1/+1 until end of turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Shalai, Voice of Plenty
card.text: Flying You, planeswalkers you control, and other creatures you control have hexproof. {4}{G}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a historic spell, return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Triumph of Gerrard
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control with the greatest power. III — Target creature you control with the greatest power gains flying, first strike, and lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Urza's Ruinous Blast
card.text: (You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Exile all nonland permanents that aren't legendary.

card.name: Academy Drake
card.text: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Flying If Academy Drake was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Academy Journeymage
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Wizard. When Academy Journeymage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: The Antiquities War
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. III — Artifacts you control become artifact creatures with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.

card.name: Arcane Flight
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.

card.name: Homarid Explorer
card.text: When Homarid Explorer enters the battlefield, target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard.

card.name: In Bolas's Clutches
card.text: Enchant permanent You control enchanted permanent. Enchanted permanent is legendary.

card.name: Karn's Temporal Sundering
card.text: (You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Target player takes an extra turn after this one. Return up to one target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Exile Karn's Temporal Sundering.

card.name: Merfolk Trickster
card.text: Flash When Merfolk Trickster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. It loses all abilities until end of turn.

card.name: The Mirari Conjecture
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand. II — Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. III — Until end of turn, whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Naban, Dean of Iteration
card.text: If a Wizard entering the battlefield under your control causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Naru Meha, Master Wizard
card.text: Flash When Naru Meha, Master Wizard enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. Other Wizards you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Opt
card.text: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) Draw a card.

card.name: Precognition Field
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library. (You may do this at any time.) You may cast the top card of your library if it's an instant or sorcery card. {3}: Exile the top card of your library.

card.name: Sage of Lat-Nam
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Sentinel of the Pearl Trident
card.text: Flash When Sentinel of the Pearl Trident enters the battlefield, you may exile target historic permanent you control. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Slinn Voda, the Rising Deep
card.text: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) When Slinn Voda, the Rising Deep enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return all creatures to their owners' hands except for Merfolk, Krakens, Leviathans, Octopuses, and Serpents.

card.name: Syncopate
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Tempest Djinn
card.text: Flying Tempest Djinn gets +1/+0 for each basic Island you control.

card.name: Tetsuko Umezawa, Fugitive
card.text: Creatures you control with power or toughness 1 or less can't be blocked.

card.name: Time of Ice
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Tap target creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Time of Ice. III — Return all tapped creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Unwind
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell. Untap up to three lands.

card.name: Wizard's Retort
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Wizard. Counter target spell.

card.name: Zahid, Djinn of the Lamp
card.text: You may pay {3}{U} and tap an untapped artifact you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Flying

card.name: Cabal Paladin
card.text: Whenever you cast a historic spell, Cabal Paladin deals 2 damage to each opponent. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Caligo Skin-Witch
card.text: Kicker {3}{B} (You may pay an additional {3}{B} as you cast this spell.) When Caligo Skin-Witch enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, each opponent discards two cards.

card.name: Cast Down
card.text: Destroy target nonlegendary creature.

card.name: Chainer's Torment
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Chainer's Torment deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life. III — Create an X/X black Nightmare Horror creature token, where X is half your life total, rounded up. It deals X damage to you.

card.name: Demonlord Belzenlok
card.text: Flying, trample When Demonlord Belzenlok enters the battlefield, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card, then put that card into your hand. If the card's converted mana cost is 4 or greater, repeat this process. Demonlord Belzenlok deals 1 damage to you for each card put into your hand this way.

card.name: Divest
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose an artifact or creature card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Drudge Sentinel
card.text: {3}: Tap Drudge Sentinel. It gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

card.name: The Eldest Reborn
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. II — Each opponent discards a card. III — Put target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Josu Vess, Lich Knight
card.text: Kicker {5}{B} (You may pay an additional {5}{B} as you cast this spell.) Menace When Josu Vess, Lich Knight enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create eight 2/2 black Zombie Knight creature tokens with menace.

card.name: Kazarov, Sengir Pureblood
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature an opponent controls is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on Kazarov, Sengir Pureblood. {3}{R}: Kazarov deals 2 damage to target creature.

card.name: Knight of Malice
card.text: First strike Hexproof from white (This creature can't be the target of white spells or abilities your opponents control.) Knight of Malice gets +1/+0 as long as any player controls a white permanent.

card.name: Lich's Mastery
card.text: Hexproof You can't lose the game. Whenever you gain life, draw that many cards. Whenever you lose life, for each 1 life you lost, exile a permanent you control or a card from your hand or graveyard. When Lich's Mastery leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

card.name: Lingering Phantom
card.text: Whenever you cast a historic spell, you may pay {B}. If you do, return Lingering Phantom from your graveyard to your hand. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Phyrexian Scriptures
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. That creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types. II — Destroy all nonartifact creatures. III — Exile all cards from all opponents' graveyards.

card.name: Rat Colony
card.text: Rat Colony gets +1/+0 for each other Rat you control. A deck can have any number of cards named Rat Colony.

card.name: Rite of Belzenlok
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Create two 0/1 black Cleric creature tokens. III — Create a 6/6 black Demon creature token with flying, trample, and "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice another creature. If you don't, this creature deals 6 damage to you."

card.name: Urgoros, the Empty One
card.text: Flying Whenever Urgoros, the Empty One deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card at random. If the player can't, you draw a card.

card.name: Vicious Offering
card.text: Kicker—Sacrifice a creature. (You may sacrifice a creature in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Yawgmoth's Vile Offering
card.text: (You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Put up to one target creature or planeswalker from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Destroy up to one target creature or planeswalker. Exile Yawgmoth's Vile Offering.

card.name: Firefist Adept
card.text: When Firefist Adept enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of Wizards you control.

card.name: The First Eruption
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — The First Eruption deals 1 damage to each creature without flying. II — Add {R}{R}. III — Sacrifice a Mountain. If you do, The First Eruption deals 3 damage to each creature.

card.name: The Flame of Keld
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Discard your hand. II — Draw two cards. III — If a red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player this turn, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Ghitu Chronicler
card.text: Kicker {3}{R} (You may pay an additional {3}{R} as you cast this spell.) When Ghitu Chronicler enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ghitu Journeymage
card.text: When Ghitu Journeymage enters the battlefield, if you control another Wizard, Ghitu Journeymage deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Ghitu Lavarunner
card.text: As long as there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Ghitu Lavarunner gets +1/+0 and has haste.

card.name: Goblin Barrage
card.text: Kicker—Sacrifice an artifact or Goblin. (You may sacrifice an artifact or Goblin in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Goblin Barrage deals 4 damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked, it also deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Goblin Chainwhirler
card.text: First strike When Goblin Chainwhirler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature and planeswalker they control.

card.name: Goblin Warchief
card.text: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Goblin creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Haphazard Bombardment
card.text: When Haphazard Bombardment enters the battlefield, choose four nonenchantment permanents you don't control and put an aim counter on each of them. At the beginning of your end step, if two or more permanents you don't control have an aim counter on them, destroy one of those permanents at random.

card.name: Jaya Ballard
card.text: +1: Add {R}{R}{R}. Spend this mana only to cast instant or sorcery spells. +1: Discard up to three cards, then draw that many cards. −8: You get an emblem with "You may cast instant and sorcery cards from your graveyard. If a card cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead."

card.name: Jaya's Immolating Inferno
card.text: (You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Jaya's Immolating Inferno deals X damage to each of up to three targets.

card.name: Keldon Overseer
card.text: Kicker {3}{R} (You may pay an additional {3}{R} as you cast this spell.) Haste When Keldon Overseer enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Siege-Gang Commander
card.text: When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens. {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Squee, the Immortal
card.text: You may cast Squee, the Immortal from your graveyard or from exile.

card.name: Two-Headed Giant
card.text: Whenever Two-Headed Giant attacks, flip two coins. If both come up heads, Two-Headed Giant gains double strike until end of turn. If both come up tails, Two-Headed Giant gains menace until end of turn.

card.name: Valduk, Keeper of the Flame
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, for each Aura and Equipment attached to Valduk, Keeper of the Flame, create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Exile those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Verix Bladewing
card.text: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Verix Bladewing enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create Karox Bladewing, a legendary 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

card.name: Warcry Phoenix
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, return Warcry Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

card.name: Warlord's Fury
card.text: Creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Wizard's Lightning
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Wizard. Wizard's Lightning deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Adventurous Impulse
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Grunn, the Lonely King
card.text: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) If Grunn, the Lonely King was kicked, it enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Grunn attacks alone, double its power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Kamahl's Druidic Vow
card.text: (You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Look at the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of land and/or legendary permanent cards with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Llanowar Elves
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Llanowar Envoy
card.text: {1}{G}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Marwyn, the Nurturer
card.text: Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Marwyn, the Nurturer. {T}: Add an amount of {G} equal to Marwyn's power.

card.name: Saproling Migration
card.text: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens. If this spell was kicked, create four of those tokens instead.

card.name: Song of Freyalise
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Until your next turn, creatures you control gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color." III — Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance, trample, and indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Steel Leaf Champion
card.text: Steel Leaf Champion can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Sylvan Awakening
card.text: Until your next turn, all lands you control become 2/2 Elemental creatures with reach, indestructible, and haste. They're still lands.

card.name: Territorial Allosaurus
card.text: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Territorial Allosaurus enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it fights another target creature.

card.name: Thorn Elemental
card.text: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Adeliz, the Cinder Wind
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Wizards you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Arvad the Cursed
card.text: Deathtouch, lifelink Other legendary creatures you control get +2/+2.

card.name: Aryel, Knight of Windgrace
card.text: Vigilance {2}{W}, {T}: Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. {B}, {T}, Tap X untapped Knights you control: Destroy target creature with power X or less.

card.name: Darigaaz Reincarnated
card.text: Flying, trample, haste If Darigaaz Reincarnated would die, instead exile it with three egg counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Darigaaz is exiled with an egg counter on it, remove an egg counter from it. Then if Darigaaz has no egg counters on it, return it to the battlefield.

card.name: Garna, the Bloodflame
card.text: Flash When Garna, the Bloodflame enters the battlefield, return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from anywhere this turn. Other creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Grand Warlord Radha
card.text: Haste Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, add that much mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

card.name: Hallar, the Firefletcher
card.text: Trample Whenever you cast a spell, if that spell was kicked, put a +1/+1 counter on Hallar, the Firefletcher, then Hallar deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to each opponent.

card.name: Jhoira, Weatherlight Captain
card.text: Whenever you cast a historic spell, draw a card. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Jodah, Archmage Eternal
card.text: Flying You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for spells that you cast.

card.name: Muldrotha, the Gravetide
card.text: During each of your turns, you may play up to one permanent card of each permanent type from your graveyard. (If a card has multiple permanent types, choose one as you play it.)

card.name: Oath of Teferi
card.text: When Oath of Teferi enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent you control. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. You may activate the loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control twice each turn rather than only once.

card.name: Primevals' Glorious Rebirth
card.text: (You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.) Return all legendary permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Raff Capashen, Ship's Mage
card.text: Flash Flying You may cast historic spells as though they had flash. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Rona, Disciple of Gix
card.text: When Rona, Disciple of Gix enters the battlefield, you may exile target historic card from your graveyard. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.) You may cast nonland cards exiled with Rona. {4}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library.

card.name: Shanna, Sisay's Legacy
card.text: Shanna, Sisay's Legacy can't be the target of abilities your opponents control. Shanna gets +1/+1 for each creature you control.

card.name: Slimefoot, the Stowaway
card.text: Whenever a Saproling you control dies, Slimefoot, the Stowaway deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life. {4}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Tatyova, Benthic Druid
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

card.name: Teferi, Hero of Dominaria
card.text: +1: Draw a card. At the beginning of the next end step, untap two lands. −3: Put target nonland permanent into its owner's library third from the top. −8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you draw a card, exile target permanent an opponent controls."

card.name: Tiana, Ship's Caretaker
card.text: Flying, first strike Whenever an Aura or Equipment you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may return that card to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Damping Sphere
card.text: If a land is tapped for two or more mana, it produces {C} instead of any other type and amount. Each spell a player casts costs {1} more to cast for each other spell that player has cast this turn.

card.name: Forebear's Blade
Gilded Lotus
card.text: {T}: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool.

card.name: Guardians of Koilos
card.text: When Guardians of Koilos enters the battlefield, you may return another target historic permanent you control to its owner's hand. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Helm of the Host
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of equipped creature, except the token isn't legendary if equipped creature is legendary. That token gains haste. Equip {5}

card.name: Howling Golem
card.text: Whenever Howling Golem attacks or blocks, each player draws a card.

card.name: Icy Manipulator
card.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Juggernaut
card.text: Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

card.name: Mishra's Self-Replicator
card.text: Whenever you cast a historic spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of Mishra's Self-Replicator. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Mox Amber
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary creatures and planeswalkers you control.

card.name: Powerstone Shard
card.text: {T}: Add {C} for each artifact you control named Powerstone Shard.

card.name: Weatherlight
card.text: Flying Whenever Weatherlight deals combat damage to a player, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a historic card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.) Crew 3

card.name: Cabal Stronghold
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}: Add {B} for each basic Swamp you control.

card.name: Clifftop Retreat
card.text: Clifftop Retreat enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Plains. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Hinterland Harbor
card.text: Hinterland Harbor enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or an Island. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Isolated Chapel
card.text: Isolated Chapel enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Memorial to Folly
card.text: Memorial to Folly enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to Folly: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Memorial to Genius
card.text: Memorial to Genius enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. {4}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to Genius: Draw two cards.

card.name: Memorial to Glory
card.text: Memorial to Glory enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}. {3}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to Glory: Creature two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Memorial to Unity
card.text: Memorial to Unity enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {2}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to Unity: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Memorial to War
card.text: Memorial to War enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to War: Destroy target land.

card.name: Sulfur Falls
card.text: Sulfur Falls enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Mountain. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Woodland Cemetery
card.text: Woodland Cemetery enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Forest. {T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Zhalfirin Void
card.text: When Zhalfirin Void enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Teferi, Timebender
card.text: +2: Untap up to one target artifact or creature. −3: You gain 2 life and draw two cards. −9: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Temporal Machinations
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If you control an artifact, draw a card.

card.name: Niambi, Faithful Healer
card.text: When Niambi, Faithful Healer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Teferi, Timebender, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Teferi's Sentinel
card.text: As long as you control a Teferi planeswalker, Teferi's Sentinel gets +4/+0

card.name: Meandering River
card.text: Meandering River enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Chandra, Bold Pyromancer
card.text: +1: Add {R}{R}. Chandra, Bold Pyromancer deals 2 damage to target player. −3: Chandra, Bold Pyromancer deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. −7: Chandra, Bold Pyromancer deals 10 damage to target player and each creature and planeswalker they control.

card.name: Chandra's Outburst
card.text: Chandra's Outburst deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Chandra, Bold Pryomancer, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Karpulsan Hound
card.text: Whenever Karpulsan Hound attacks, if you control a Chandra planeswalker, this creature deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Pyromantic Pilgrim
card.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

card.name: Timber Gorge
card.text: Timber Gorge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Firesong and Sunspeaker
card.text: Red instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink. Whenever a white instant or sorcery spell causes you to gain life, Firesong and Sunspeaker deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
